about_the_game:
Attention commander of the great moss piglet horde! Your moss piglets need your help to get through these terrible dangerous terrains and worlds. No one is sure of the reason for the moss piglet horde being here in this strange land. Now it falls upon you to rally your troops, maintain your resources, and SURVIVE. As your journey unfolds, you will face many obstacles and strange paths. Do not despair! You can be victorious!

This hilarious, simple, top-down RTS game, the player will control their horde of moss piglets through a variety of levels requiring you to solve puzzles, evade deadly obstacles, and to stay alive. This will prove difficult, as moss piglets do not have much of a survival instinct. The underlying lore of this world is sure to fascinate the player with the unexpected and the unknown. Moss piglets have many awesome abilities such as healing, burning, freezing, and more that the player will learn to control. Each level holds surprising new adventures for the player! Good luck!
